results.title: Connecting Towns: A South Gippsland Cluster
results.brief_description: Take a tour through four small picturesque towns in South Gippsland that are combining their resources to create opportunities for growth. Here we meet some locals from Bena, Loch, Poowong and Nyora, in their places of significance as they reflect on personal memories and describe the uniqueness of where they live.
results.description: Take a tour through four small picturesque towns in South Gippsland that are combining their resources to create opportunities for growth. results.title: Congo: the way ahead
results.creator_credit: United Nations. Office of Public Information, George Movshon, Frank Jacoby and Robert Morgan
results.brief_description: Through the eyes of a 15-year-old Congo schoolboy, reveals the current (1963) situation in the Congo. The tragic circumstances which since 1960 have led to a decline in the standards of living of millions of people - the story of the patient painstaking efforts of the Congo people to build a modern and flourishing state are vividly portrayed, and the UN efforts to help.

results.title: Congenital broncho-oesophageal fistula in an adult
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Francois Seguillon, Jean Roy and Claudia Overing
results.brief_description: This is a film record of a surgical operation, performed in a Montreal hospital in December, 1968, to correct a rare congenital anomaly in a sixty-six year old male - a case in which there was a fistula between the normal oesophagus and a bronchial segment. A report of this case was published in the Canadian Medical Association Journal, May 9, 1970, v. 102.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Francois Seguillon, Jean Roy and Claudia Overing

results.title: Confusion: diagnosis and management
results.creator_credit: Sidhartha Films and Scottish Health Education Unit
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Health education and the elderly”.
One in a series about techniques for the management and treatment of confusion in the elderly. This episode looks in some detail, at the various causes of acute confusion, outlining the basic principles of treatment.

results.title: Confusion
results.creator_credit: Sidhartha Films and Scottish Health Education Unit
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Health education and the elderly”.
An elderly woman is found ill and confused by her neighbour. We follow the process of hospital admission through her eyes. The film stresses the importance of correct initial diagnosis and the importance of sympathetic attitudes from medical staff.
